answerText: Bus Stop[10] Bus Stop was written by this American author who also wrote a work in which Hal and Madge skip the title event and spend the night together in a car, his play Picnic.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Penn | 3 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Cherie asks the sheriff Will Masters to protect her from the desires of Bo Decker in this play whose plot is sent into motion by a snowstorm. For 10 points each: [10] Carl has a casual relationship with Grace Hoylard, the owner of the title location of this work. Grace employs the high school student Elma Duckworth as a waitress at her diner.
